relation: Set to the resource group name of your SE as registered in OIM.

Set to the database section containing the login details for your Gratia Collector (a few, non-functioning examples sections are included). Installing a Gratia Collector is covered here, but ask around on osg-hadoop: Nebraska will usually run these reports for you if requested.
Python list for the "to names" for the report email.
Python list for the "to emails" for the report email.
Hostname of a SMTP server that accepts email from this host.
Set to the "from name" for the report email.
Set to the "from email" for the report email.
